text: I really recommend reading the CMS docs (or at least skimming) for the top level overview of whats possible :slightly_smiling_face: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms>
but if you want to jump straight in - I recommend cloning this repo - <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate> and having a nose around.
Hi AJ, unfortunately I am still unable to create or publish pages. I will have a look at the Dev Dashboard - thanks!

Hey there, what Kieran said was good advice, there are good examples in our boilerplate. If youâ€™d like more information:

Blog templates are explained in our documentation here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/templates/blog-template-markup>

Blogs also have special variables available to them to help in the creation of blogs. They are listed on our HubL variables page.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/variables#blog-variables>
i will start off  from the boilerplate
Sounds good, let me know if you keep running into issues Tanya
